results.definition: a sign of assent or salutation or command

examples: The old man sat nodding by the fireplace

results.definition: lower and raise the head, as to indicate assent or agreement or confirmation
examples: The teacher nodded when the student gave the right answer

results.definition: sway gently back and forth, as in a nodding motion
examples: the flowers were nodding in the breeze

results.definition: the act of nodding the head
let the head fall forward through drowsiness
examples: The old man was nodding in his chair
